"},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/design-notes":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/design-notes","created":"20250506141746326","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":"* Allow edit filter * allow select filter? * Allow close icon on list * Allow save filter if not already? * [[discussion Notes here|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/how-to-create-a-field-macro-similar-to-the-tag-macro/5975/16?u=tw_tones]] * Allow named actions macroname to be given to action each list item or all items? * use filter and *-filter fields * option to use a filename or filepath? * Generate a permaview? or search filter? * Select from listed items ** Add to or remove from another list? ** draggable titles if not for reordering already but drop where?, below ** keep popup open? * Search within listed? * Allow inclusion of tag pill items?"},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/examples":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/examples","created":"20250506141813350","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":"<> <> <> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="导出文件夹zip"> {{$:/core/images/export-folder-zip}} 导出文件夹zip <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param="$:/temp/filter-pills/_ZipTiddler"/> <$list tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param="$:/temp/filter-pills/_ZipTiddler" tiddler=<> filename=<>/> "},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/filter-icon":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/filter-icon","created":"20250506141908174","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":""},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/heading":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/heading","created":"20250506141937318","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/FilterDropdown "},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/macros":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/macros","code-body":"yes","created":"20250506142004438","discussion":"https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/how-to-create-a-field-macro-similar-to-the-tag-macro/5975/23?u=tw_tones","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Macro 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\define filter-pill(filter label:"<<__filter__>>" tooltip:"Filter Pill" icon-tiddler:"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/filter-icon" pillcolour:lightblue textcolour:black show-count:"yes" id) \whitespace trim <$let popupID=<> filter="$filter$" show-count="$show-count$"> <$set name=item-count filter="[subfiltercount[]]"> <$button tooltip="""$tooltip$""" dragFilter="$filter$" class="tc-tag-label tc-btn-invisible" style="background-color:$pillcolour$; color:$textcolour$;" popup=<> > {{$icon-tiddler$}}$label$<$list filter="[match[yes]]" variable=~> ^^<$text text=<>/>^^ <$reveal type="popup" state=<> >
<$list filter=" [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/heading]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/search-count]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/export-button]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/export-folder-zip]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/open-all]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/close-all]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/copy-list]] [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/copy-filter]] " variable=dropdown-item> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
<$list filter="[subfilter]" template="$:/PSaT/filter-pills/ListItem"/>
\end \define search-filter-count(filter) \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch" $value="""$filter$"""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" $value="""$filter$"""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" $value="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"/> <$action-navigate $to="$:/AdvancedSearch"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".tc-advanced-search input"/> ''<$count filter="""$filter$"""/>'' {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}} 高级搜索 \end <> <> "},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/open-all":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/open-all","code-body":"yes","created":"20250506142113366","description":"Open all tiddlers matching the filter in the filter-pill dropdown","modified":"20250506150631739","source-tiddler":"$:/PSaT/reimagine-tags/open-all-tagged","tags":"$:/tags/FilterDropdown 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"<$list filter="[subfilterlimit[1]] +[!match[0]]" variable=~> <$button tooltip="打开所有筛选的条目" class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="no"/> 打开所有筛选的条目 "},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/search-count":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/search-count","created":"20250506142229975","list-after":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/heading","modified":"20250506150631739","source-tiddler":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/copy-filter","tags":"$:/tags/FilterDropdown filter=<>/>"},"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/stylesheet":{"title":"$:/PSaT/filter-pills/stylesheet","created":"20250506142333446","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet reload","filename":"history-sidebar","modified":"20250506150631739","package-filter":"$:/PSaT/history-sidebar","psat-project":"history-sidebar","tags":"宏 $:/tags/SideBar 历史记录 编辑记录和历史记录 "},"$:/core/images/export-folder-zip":{"title":"$:/core/images/export-folder-zip","created":"20250521073751062","modified":"20250521075802894","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 $:/tags/FilterDropdown 筛选器下拉菜单 导出文件夹zip","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/images/filter-pill":{"title":"$:/core/images/filter-pill","created":"20240322031702866","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/images/open-history":{"title":"$:/core/images/open-history","created":"20240415084618862","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 历史记录 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/open-history":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/open-history","caption":"{{$:/core/images/open-history}} 历史记录","created":"20240415084804645","description":"历史记录","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/ViewToolbar 历史记录 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\whitespace trim <$set value={{{ [addprefix[$:/temp/open-history]] }}} name="open-historyTiddler"> <$button popup=<> tooltip="打开过的条目历史记录" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]">{{$:/core/images/open-history}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]">打开过的条目历史记录 <$reveal type="popup" state=<> position="belowleft" tag="div" class="tc-popup-keep">
<$transclude tiddler="编辑记录和历史记录"/>
"},"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/filter-pill":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/filter-pill","caption":"{{$:/core/images/filter-pill}} 筛选","condition":"[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]","created":"20240322031448672","description":"添加一个筛选","icon":"$:/core/images/filter-pill","modified":"20250506150631739","shortcuts":"((filter-pill))","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/EditorToolbar 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="wrap-selection" prefix='< "},"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open2":{"title":"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open2","caption":"{{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}","created":"20240416082546680","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore,]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<> enable=<> tag="div"> <>
$button$
\end
{{||筛选器下拉菜单关闭其他条目}}
<$list filter="[list]" history=<> storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="<$button message='tm-close-tiddler' tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class='tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right'>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$link/>"/>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="<$button message='tm-close-all-tiddlers' class='tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini'><>"/>
"},"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent2":{"title":"$:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent2","caption":"最近","created":"20240228014405843","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar 筛选器下拉菜单 编辑记录和历史记录 编辑记录","text":"<> <> "},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/history","created":"20250521130659609","modified":"20250521130835574","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":"; v.0.0.3 2025-05-22 历史记录弹窗背景颜色随主题条目背景颜色变化 ; v.0.0.2 2025-05-21 * 优化按钮排版； * 新增导出多个tid格式单条目到文件夹zip 需要安装依赖插件 [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/jszip]] 关键代码如下： [[$:/PSaT/filter-pills/export-folder-zip]] * 替换所有文件系统不安全的字符（/, :, ", |, ?, *, ^, <, >, \）为下划线 * 替换所有空白字符为下划线 * 添加.tid扩展名 ```tw \define folder-zip1() /|\:|\"|\||\?|\*|\^|\<|\>|\\ \define folder-zip2() \s+ \define folder-zip0() _ filename={{{ [search-replace:g:regexp,search-replace:g:regexp,addsuffix[.tid]] }}} ``` "},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/readme","created":"20250506123852676","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 筛选器下拉菜单和历史记录"},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/PlainTabs":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/PlainTabs","text":"/* See http://plaintabs.tiddlyspot.com */ 
.tc-tab-buttons {
  margin-bottom:0px;
  padding-left:.5vw;
}
.tc-tab-divider {
  margin-top:-1px;
}
.tc-tab-buttons button {
  opacity:.9;
}
.tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
  border-bottom:1px solid <>;
  opacity:1;
}
.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button {
  background-image:none;
  border: 1px solid transparent;
  opacity:.9;
}
.tc-tab-buttons.tc-vertical button.tc-tab-selected {
  background:inherit;
  border:1px solid <>;
  border-right: 1px solid <>;
  opacity:1;
}
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button {
  border:0;
}
.tc-sidebar-lists .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
  border-bottom: 1px solid <>;
}
.tc-tab-content.tc-vertical {
  border-left:1px solid  <>;
}
.tc-more-sidebar .tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {
  border: 1px solid <>;
  border-right: 1px solid <>;
}
","created":"20250506145807100","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet tab样式 筛选器下拉菜单","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/历史记录弹窗样式css":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/历史记录弹窗样式css","text":".open-history-body { padding: 10px 20px; background-color: <>; min-width: 250px; /* 默认宽度 */ border-radius: 8px; /* 圆角 */ box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* 阴影 */ font-size: 16px; /* 字体大小 */ overflow-y: auto; max-height: 80vh; scrollbar-width: thin; /* 自定义滚动条样式 */ position: relative; /* 为.sticky-tabs提供定位上下文 */ -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; /* 去除移动端点击高亮 */ } /* 自定义Webkit内核浏览器的滚动条样式 */ .open-history-body::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 6px; /* 设置滚动条宽度 */ height: 6px; /* 设置滚动条高度 */ } .open-history-body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background-color: transparent; /* 设置滚动滑块的背景颜色 */ border-radius: 3px; /* 设置滚动滑块的圆角 */ } .open-history-body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background-color: <>; /* 鼠标悬停时滚动滑块的颜色 */ } /* tab选项卡样式 */ .open-history-body .tc-tab-buttons { position: sticky; /* 使用粘性定位 */ top: -10px; /* 距离容器顶部距离，即粘在顶部 */ z-index: 10; /* 设置较高的层级，防止被其他内容遮挡 */ background-color: <>; /* 设置背景色，与容器背景色相同 */ } .open-history-body .tc-tab-buttons button { border-radius: 8px 16px 8px 16px; } /* 按钮字体和下拉菜单字体放大 */ .open-history-body .tc-drop-down { font-size: 1em; } .open-history-body .toanchor-item-body, .open-history-body .toanchor-btn button, .open-history-body .anchor-date-column button { font-size: 1.3em; opacity: 1; } /* 下拉菜单悬停背景颜色 */ .open-history-body .tc-drop-down a:hover { background-color: <>; /* 鼠标悬停时的背景颜色 */ } /* 居中对齐 */ .my-filter-pill-btn1 { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .my-filter-pill-btn2 { } .my-filter-pill-btn { color: <>; background-color: transparent; border: none; } .my-filter-pill-btn:hover { background-color: ; cursor: pointer; } .my-filter-pill-btn1, .my-filter-pill-btn2 { opacity: 0.5; transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out; } .my-filter-pill-btn1:hover, .my-filter-pill-btn2:hover { opacity: 1; } /* .my-tags-body */ { min-width: 50vh; /* 默认宽度 */ min-height: 90vh; /* 默认高度 */ } .my-filter-pill-mulu { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .my-filter-pill-mulu svg { width: 14px; /* 调整图标宽度 */ height: 14px; /* 调整图标高度 */ } ","created":"20250506145143764","modified":"20250506150704539","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet 历史记录 样式 筛选器下拉菜单","type":""},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/最近编辑的条目时间精确到秒css":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/最近编辑的条目时间精确到秒css","text":"/* 使用flexbox来创建一个灵活的表格布局 */ .flex-table { display: flex; flex-direction: column; width: 100%; /* padding-right: 10%; */ } /* flexbox的行样式 */ .flex-table-row { display: flex; width: 100%; } /* 设置“条目名称”列样式 */ .title-column { flex-grow: 1; /* 动态增长以填充可用空间 */ text-align: left; /* 靠左对齐 */ } /* 设置“编辑时间”列样式 */ .date-column { text-align: right; /* 靠右对齐 */ font-size: 0.8em; /* 字号大小 */ opacity: 0.6; width: 150px; /* 可以设置一个最大宽度，或者根据需要调整 */ } /* 标题行的样式 */ .flex-table-header { opacity: 1; margin-bottom: 0.5em; } /* 保持标题项本身的样式不变 */ .title-column.header, .date-column.header { font-size: 0.9em; opacity: 1; background-color: transparent !important; }","created":"20250506145614220","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet 样式 最近编辑的条目时间精确到秒","type":"text/css"},"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/usage","created":"20250506123908612","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":" ```tw <> ``` <> # 直接导出筛选的条目按钮已修复； # 小技巧：可反向使用，点击搜索，然后可快速删除筛选器中列出的条目； # 筛选后直接拖动导出按钮 {{$:/core/images/export-button|18px}} 到新wiki，即可把所有筛选的条目拖动过去，无需批量导出再导入; # 筛选公式增加 `all[tiddlers+shadows]` 可包含所有正常条目和影子条目； # 单个条目中筛选器名称不要重复，不然系统会识别不了。 "},"PlainTabs/settings":{"title":"PlainTabs/settings","created":"20770802224205071","creator":"","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"tab样式 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"\define plaintabspalette() tab-background:transparent tab-background-selected:inherit tab-border:transparent tab-border-selected:#a8a8a8 tab-divider:#d8d8d8 sidebar-tab-background:inherit sidebar-tab-background-selected:inherit \end \define describePaletteColour(colour) <$transclude tiddler="$:/language/Docs/PaletteColours/$colour$"><$text text="$colour$"/> \end
<$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/palette}}> <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]!is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> <$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/palette}}> <$button> <$list variable="item" filter=<> variable="item"> <$set name=pos filter="[splitbefore[:]removesuffix[:]]"> <$set name=val filter="[removeprefixremoveprefix[:]]"> <$action-setfield $index=<> $value=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/PlainTabs/Stylesheet" $field="tags" $value="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> ACTIVATE Plain Tabs.

● Activation sets some color values in the active palette <$link to={{$:/palette}}><$macrocall $name="currentTiddler" $output="text/plain"/>
● and, if not already, applies a `$:/tags/Stylesheet` tag to the Plain Tabs [[stylesheet|$:/plugins/TWaddle/PlainTabs/Stylesheet]] <$list filter="[all[current]is[shadow]is[tiddler]]" variable="listItem"> <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{$:/palette}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/TWaddle/PlainTabs/Stylesheet" $field="tags" $value=""/> DEACTIVATE Plain Tabs.

● Deactivation //restores// the active palette <$link to={{$:/palette}}><$macrocall $name="currentTiddler" $output="text/plain"/> to its default shadow state
● and it removes the `$:/tags/Stylesheet` tag from the Plain Tabs [[stylesheet|$:/plugins/TWaddle/PlainTabs/Stylesheet]] When happy, delete this particular tiddler as it serves no further purpose <$button><$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="PlainTabs/settings"/>Delete Current values in {{$:/palette}} for colors concerning tabs: <$set name="currentTiddler" value={{$:/palette}}> <$list filter=<> variable="item"> <$set name=colourName filter="[splitbefore[:]removesuffix[:]]">
''<$macrocall $name="describePaletteColour" colour=<>/>''
<$macrocall $name="colourName" $output="text/plain"/> 		<$edit-text index=<> tag="input"/>
<$edit-text index=<> type="color" tag="input" />
"},"tab样式示例":{"title":"tab样式示例","created":"20170416111128542","creator":"Mat von TWaddle","modified":"20250506150631739","modifier":"Mat von TWaddle","tags":"tab样式 筛选器下拉菜单","text":"!!!Demo <> <>
''note also the tabs in the //sidebar//''
incl. the vertical tabs under //More//
!!!Install Drag these into your TW: *[[$:/plugins/dyp/filter-pills&history/styles/PlainTabs]]
This is a common stylesheet tiddler *[[PlainTabs/settings]]
This has a quick button to set some //palette// colour values.
You can delete this tiddler after use. "},"导出文件夹zip-搜索栏":{"title":"导出文件夹zip-搜索栏","created":"20200728083941254","modified":"20250521130338502","tags":"$:/tags/AdvancedSearch/FilterButton 导出文件夹zip","text":"\define renderContent() \define folder-zip1() /|\:|\"|\||\?|\*|\^|\<|\>|\\ \define folder-zip2() \s+ \define folder-zip0() _ \define suffix-folder-zip() .tid <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-create" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler"/> <$list filter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-render-file" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename={{{ [search-replace:g:regexp,search-replace:g:regexp,addsuffix[.tid]] }}} tiddler=<> template="$:/core/templates/tid-tiddler"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-zip-download" $param="$:/temp/_ZipTiddler" filename="tiddlers.zip"/> \end <$button actions=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="导出文件夹zip"> {{$:/core/images/export-folder-zip}} <$transclude $variable="list-links" filter={{$:/temp/export-as-zip-filter}}/> "},"导出文件夹zip":{"title":"导出文件夹zip","created":"20250521080135821","modified":"20250521080158984","tags":"导出","text":"<>"},"导出条目按钮macro修改版":{"title":"导出条目按钮macro修改版","created":"20250521083435681","modified":"20250521124135824","tags":"导出文件夹zip $:/tags/Macro","text":"\function exportButtonFilename(baseFilename) [] [] +[join[]] \end \procedure myexportButton(exportFilter:"[!is[system]sort[title]]",lingoBase,baseFilename:"tiddlers") \whitespace trim <$let hint={{{ [addsuffix[Hint]get[text]] }}} caption={{{ [addsuffix[Caption]get[text]] }}} > <$button popup=<> tooltip="导出所有筛选的条目" aria-label=<> class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" dragFilter=<> > <%if [match[yes]] %> {{$:/core/images/export-button}} <%endif%> <%if [match[yes]] %> <$text text=<>/> <%endif%> 导出所有筛选的条目 <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">

''紧急导出最近修改过的条目'' """ 数字可以修改，limit[10]表示最近修改过的10个条目 <> <> """ language:"tw">> 带有特定标签的最近修改过的10个条目 <> <> """ language:"tw">> """ !!!! ''列出最近修改过的条目'' """ 按时间顺序列出最近修改过的10个条目，如果一天之内修改超过10个条目，会将当天修改过的条目全部列出 <> """ language:"tw">> 可添加子筛选器，如筛选出带有特定标签的最近修改过的10个条目 <> """ language:"tw">> <> """"},"编辑记录和历史记录":{"title":"编辑记录和历史记录","created":"20240416014104348","modified":"20250506150631739","tags":"筛选器下拉菜单","text":"<>"}}}
